titleStmt.title: The castel of helth gathered and made by Syr Thomas Elyot knyghte, out of the chiefe authors of physyke, wherby euery manne may knowe the state of his owne body, the preseruatio[n] of helthe, and how to instructe welle his physytion in syckenes that he be not deceyued
titleStmt.author: Elyot, Thomas, Sir, 1490?-1546.

publicationStmt.publisher: In ædibus Thomæ Bertheleti typis impress.],

notesStmt.note: Printer's name, place of publication and actual publication date from colophon.
An edition of: Elyot, Sir Thomas. The castell of helthe.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
